verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a continued escalation of his war on the press] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [V: attacked] [ARG1: NBC ’s Chuck Todd] [ARG2: over Todd ’s analysis of the planned summit between Trump and North Korean ruler Kim Jong Un] . This time , however , Trump was called out for using coded , anti - semitic language to attack the NBC anchor .
